title: Why we need Old forums back
body:
Ahh good ol GD, a place where there was a strong sense of community and henceforth positive community interaction.
Fast forward to now, boards. Where the whole community is.. oh wait, what community? just a bunch of people QQing about server skins, champion nerfs/buffs and blaming riot for everything.

When forums was shut down, we lost the soul of oce, the GD community shattered, reduced to miscellaneous, irrelevant, forgotten. 
But yet a small number live on in the "general discussion" chat but now, even that's dying.

Dear riot, please give us our community back.  
-GD

replies.body:
This place looks real dead, everytime I come around.

People on old forums still cried and whinged about stuff, myself included but at least it looked like there was a community.

What is the difference? I was never around for the forums, but if we switched now wouldn't it just be the same community but on the old forums? I don't see any reason for people to stop complaining about Riven and the matchmaking system because they switched to a old forums format.
